mapper.sql: cy.CY001, cy.CY002, cy.CY003, cy.CY004, cy.CY005, cy.CY006, cy.SA001, cy.CY009, cy.CY010, cy.CY011, cy.CY012, cy.CY013, cy.CY014, cy.CY015, cy.CY016, cy.CY017
mapper.select: select cy.* from st4_scs_cy cy left join st4_sys_sa sa on cy.CY012 = sa.SA001 left join st4_sys_sg sg on sa.SG001 = sg.SG001 where sa.SA007 = 1 and sg.SG007 =1 and cy.CY016=1 and sg.SG001=#{sg001}

SELECT PK_ID, COM_NAME, SA001, SA015, uname,totalCheckNum,checkNum,rwcs,gjlc,rwsc, (totalCheckNum - checkNum) AS uncheckNum FROM ( select com.PK_ID, com.COM_NAME, sa.SA001, sa.SA015, sa.SA019 uname, IFNULL(COUNT(cy.CY001),0) rwcs, IFNULL(SUM(cy.CY006),0) gjlc, IFNULL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,CY003,CY004)),0) rwsc, SUM(IF(cd.cd001 IS NULL,0,1)) totalCheckNum,
COUNT(ck.ck088=1) checkNum FROM sys_company com
RIGHT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_po_cd_sa cdsa ON cdsa.SA001 = sa.SA001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cd cd ON cdsa.cd001 = cd.cd001 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004,ck049) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001) ck ON ck.CD004 = cd.cd001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cc cc ON cc.CD004 = cd.CD001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cy cy ON cc.CY017 = cy.CY017 WHERE 1=1 and com.PK_ID!=1
and com.COM_F_CODE=#{code} or com.com_code = #{code}
and com.COM_LEVEL=2
and sa.SA019 like '%${uname}%'
and sa.SA015 like '%${deptName}%'
and cl.CL002 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl002}%'
and cl.CL010 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl010}%'
group by com.PK_ID
group by sa.sa015
group by com.PK_ID
) T
group by PK_ID
group by sa015
group by PK_ID
WHERE uname IS NOT NULL group by uname

SELECT PK_ID, COM_NAME, SA001, SA015, uname,totalCheckNum,checkNum,rwcs,gjlc,rwsc, (totalCheckNum - checkNum) AS uncheckNum FROM ( select com.PK_ID, com.COM_NAME, sa.SA001, sa.SA015, sa.SA019 uname, IFNULL(COUNT(cy.CY001),0) rwcs, IFNULL(SUM(cy.CY006),0) gjlc, IFNULL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,CY003,CY004)),0) rwsc, SUM(IF(cd.cd001 IS NULL,0,1)) totalCheckNum,
COUNT(ck.ck088=1) checkNum FROM sys_company com
RIGHT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_po_cd_sa cdsa ON cdsa.SA001 = sa.SA001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cd cd ON cdsa.cd001 = cd.cd001 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004,CK049,CK091) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001) ck ON ck.CD004 = cd.cd001 AND cl.CL001 = ck.ck091 AND ck.CK049 = CDSA.SA001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cc cc ON cc.CD004 = cd.CD001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cy cy ON cc.CY017 = cy.CY017 WHERE 1=1 and com.PK_ID!=1
and com.COM_F_CODE=#{code} or com.com_code = #{code}
and com.COM_LEVEL=2
and sa.SA019 like '%${uname}%'
and sa.SA015 like '%${deptName}%'
and cl.CL002 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl002}%'
and cl.CL010 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl010}%'
group by com.PK_ID
group by sa.sa015
group by com.PK_ID
) T
group by PK_ID
group by sa015
group by PK_ID
WHERE uname IS NOT NULL group by uname

SELECT PK_ID, COM_NAME, SA001, SA015, uname,totalCheckNum,checkNum,rwcs,gjlc,rwsc, (totalCheckNum - checkNum) AS uncheckNum FROM ( SELECT com.PK_ID, com.COM_NAME, sa.SA001, sa.SA015, sa.SA019 AS uname , IFNULL(COUNT(cy.CY001), 0) AS rwcs , IFNULL(SUM(cy.CY006), 0) AS gjlc , IFNULL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, CY003, CY004)), 0) AS rwsc , COUNT(DISTINCT cdsa.cd001, cdsa.sa001,cdsa.CL001) AS totalCheckNum , COUNT(DISTINCT cdsa.cd001, cdsa.sa001, ck.CD004,ck.ck091) AS checkNum FROM sys_company com
RIGHT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa ON sa.SD001 = com.COM_CODE
LEFT JOIN st4_po_cd_sa cdsa ON cdsa.SA001 = sa.SA001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cd cd ON cdsa.cd001 = cd.cd001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cl cl on cl.CL001= cdsa.CL001 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(CK001) AS id FROM st4_scs_ck GROUP BY CD004,CK049,CK091) t INNER JOIN st4_scs_ck k ON t.id = k.CK001) ck ON ck.CD004 = cd.cd001 AND cl.CL001=ck.ck091 AND ck.CK049 = CDSA.SA001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cc cc ON cc.CD004 = cd.CD001 LEFT JOIN st4_scs_cy cy ON cc.CY017 = cy.CY017 WHERE 1=1 and com.PK_ID!=1
and com.COM_F_CODE=#{code} or com.com_code = #{code}
and com.COM_LEVEL=2
and sa.SA019 like '%${uname}%'
and sa.SA015 like '%${deptName}%'
and cl.CL002 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl002}%'
and cl.CL010 like '%${st4ScsCl.cl010}%'
group by com.PK_ID
group by sa.sa015
group by com.PK_ID
) T
group by PK_ID
group by sa015
group by PK_ID
WHERE uname IS NOT NULL group by uname
SELECT count(*) from st4_scs_cy cy LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sg sg on cy.CY010=sg.SG001 LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa on cy.SA001=sa.SA001 where cy.CY016 =1 and sg.SG007 =1 and sa.SA007 =1 and cy.SA001 = #{sa001}

SELECT cy.*,sg.SG008 bhdmc,sa.SA019 xcry from st4_scs_cy cy LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sg sg on cy.CY010=sg.SG001 LEFT JOIN st4_sys_sa sa on cy.SA001=sa.SA001 where cy.CY016 =1 and sg.SG007 =1 and sa.SA007 =1 and cy.SA001 = #{sa001} ORDER BY CY013 limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}
